bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with wu zang nüe 五臟瘧 , the five types of depot malaria. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fu zi 附子 quoting Ji sheng fang 濟生方 Zhu nüe men 諸瘧門 , Section “All types of malaria”, Zhu nüe lun zhi 諸瘧論治 , “Treatment of all types of malaria:” 七棗湯，治五 臟氣虛，陰陽相勝，作為痎瘧 , “The ‘decoction with seven zao ’ serves to treat qi depletion of the five depots, with yin and yang [qi] dominating alternatingly, resulting in malaria”, writes 五臟氣虛，陰陽相勝，發為臟瘧 , “When the qi in the five depots is depleted, and yin and yang [qi] dominate alternatingly, this effuses as depot malaria ”.
